metadata.dc:title: BC Schools Master File
metadata.dc:creator: CHART Lab Data Manager
metadata.dc:subject: British Columbia
metadata.dc:description:
The BC Schools Master File provides contact information for schools, their district, and health area. It was created by merging public mailing information and BC Stats documentation on administrative areas (to add the corresponding health areas).
An in-depth process is available at https://jorgeandr3s.github.io/r-code-stories/Creating_BC_schools_Master_File.html
metadata.dc:source: Translation of Place Names into Administrative Areas from the BC Stats website (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/search)
